mapper.sql: id, task_code, task_name, remarks, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.remarks,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from task t where 1=1
and t.task_name=#{form.taskName}
select t.id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.remarks,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from task t where 1=1 and t.id = #{id}
select t.id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.remarks,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from task t where t.task_code = #{taskCode}

select t.id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.remarks,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, concat(t.task_name,'(',t.remarks,')') taskDescribe from task t where 1=1
and t.task_code like concat('%',#{form.taskCode},'%')
and t.task_name like concat('%',#{t.task_name},'%')
